backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and in-memory maps for categories, products, garden centers, orders, access control, and helper functions including substring search and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries describing logo-related tasks, affected components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists high‑level summaries for all major frontend files, describing layout, routing, pages, UI components, and theme configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines base Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes, applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting page metadata, favicon assets, and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router route tree, theme provider, cart provider, and application shell for all pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access‑denied UI with message, optional principal info panel, and a button linking home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalId: Displays the user's principal ID with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name. Handles form submission and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Route guard that checks for authentication and admin role, showing loading skeletons or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Component that blocks unauthenticated access and shows a login prompt until the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Route guard ensuring the user is authenticated and has a customer role, with loading and access-denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Route guard requiring garden center membership or platform admin status, with skeleton loading and access-denied handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Route guard for platform admins, showing loading skeletons or access denied with principal ID if unauthorized.
Main layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routing outlet.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Renders social media/contact buttons for WhatsApp, Instagram, and email.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with brand info, quick links, contact details, and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, role-based portal/admin links, mobile menu, and user/cart controls.
Displays a badge with cart item count when items exist.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Product card showing image, name, description, price, and stock status with fallback handling for broken images.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: Provides mutations for adding products, initializing seed data, and a placeholder for toggling product active state with query invalidation and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Fetches active products and filters them by garden center for admin views since the backend lacks a direct method.
Handles garden center queries and member mutations, with several operations unimplemented in the backend and returning placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/usePlatformAdmi: Provides mutations to grant and revoke admin access by principal and invalidates caller role data.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s role with error fallback and exposes a helper to check admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Queries the current user profile via the actor with basic loading state merging.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Fetches a simple boolean indicating whether the caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Mutation to save the caller’s user profile and refresh profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Creates a new garden center and invalidates related role and center queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Fetches products for a garden center by filtering active products and supports mutations for adding or placeholder-updating products.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Retrieves the caller’s primary garden center using a temporary placeholder structure due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Mutation to update garden center details and invalidate corresponding queries.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Fetches user orders but currently returns an empty list due to missing backend support.
Placeholder mutation for placing orders that currently throws an error because the backend method is unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useCategor: Fetches all categories from the backend when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useFullCat: Loads the full category taxonomy structure for storefront views.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Fetches an individual product from the backend using its ID.
React Query hooks for fetching active products, category-filtered products, and client-side searched products.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and loading identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Admin interface for viewing, expanding, and managing garden centers and their members, including enabling, disabling, and removal actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlatformAd: Admin page for adding and removing platform admin principals with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for adding new products, toggling product active state, and initializing seed data using category and product hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls and total calculations, allowing clearing or navigating to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows product listings with search, category filters, and taxonomy-based filtering logic.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders checkout flow with order summary and order placement, requiring user authentication.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the storefront homepage with hero content, feature cards, and top-level category listings using taxonomy data.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's order history with status, product details, totals, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Nursery dashboard for managing garden center details and products, including editing info, adding products with images, and toggling active status.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Presents an order confirmation message and optionally displays the order ID with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Customer portal redirect that sends authenticated customers to the catalog or shows access denial based on role.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Nursery portal that redirects existing members to the dashboard or allows new users to register a garden center.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Team portal for platform admins with role-based redirects, loading/error states, and principal ID display.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed product information with an image gallery, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context provider managing cart state, persistence, and actions like add, update, remove, and clear.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: Utility for loading, saving, and clearing cart data in localStorage with versioning and BigInt handling.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Type definitions for cart items, state, actions, and context shape.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Custom hook to access the cart context and enforce provider usage.
frontend/src/utils/categoryTaxonomy.ts: Helpers for flattening category taxonomy, finding nodes, and extracting leaf, descendant, and top-level categories.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based), persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, spacing, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the GreenPlantz web and mobile app build.
